name: P-T-R
description:
"As one of the very first arrivals on Earth's biggest corporate-owned space station P.T.R you were happy on starting a new life among your co-workers and customers. But who knew that everything would turn out like this?"

P.T.R is a first-person shooter in which you make your way through the various parts of the space station where you will get to read about the antics of your fellow co-workers, defeat enemies and search for your loved one.

It has been days since you finally arrived on P.T.R with your partner, and you couldn't be happier. However, a malfunction causes the security system to attack everyone. You are the one chosen out of your group to make your way to the bridge to find out what happened and rescue your beloved one.
